titles.title: Medication Therapy Management Empowerment Act of 2015
A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to improve access to medication therapy management under part D of the Medicare program.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
3/18/2015--Introduced. Medication Therapy Management Empowerment Act of 2015
This bill amends part D (Voluntary Prescription Drug Benefit Program) of title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to make a targeted beneficiary under the medication therapy management program of a part D eligible individual who has a single chronic disease of cardiovascular disease, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease, hyperlipidemia, or diabetes.
